00008 void stripHyphen(string& key, string& value) {
00009         // check if the key is a '--'
00010         if(key.substr(0, 2) == "--") {
00011                 // key goes until space or '='
00012                 int i;
00013                 for(i = 2; i < key.length(); ++i)
00014                         if(key[i] == ' ' || key[i] == '=') break;
00015                 
00016                 value = key.substr(i + 1, key.length() - i - 1);
00017                 key = key.substr(2, i - 2);
00018         } else {
00019                 if(key.length() > 2) {
00020                         value = key.substr(2, key.length() - 1);
00021                         key = key[1];
00022                 } else {
00023                         // some arguments do not require a value
00024                         key = key[1];
00025                         if(key == "c" || key == "e" || key == "h" || key == "K" || key == "r" ||
00026                            key == "x" || key == "v" || key == "V") value = "";
00027                         else value = "<next>";
00028                 }
00029         }
00030 }
